Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • q1.auction.Bid

  • public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage bids A bid comprises: an item or lot being bid for a bidder an amount being bid or offered for the lot
    Version:
    07.3.2016
    Author:
    jf
